value: It was just another normal day on Planet Earth. It was a beautiful normal day like any other, Vinny was living his normal life, he still hadn't showered, and he was talking to his friend Yasmin through Discord. It was a simple super decisive conversation for her to finally pay the X-Tudo Vinny wanted so much. Vinny was very happy, as he had been waiting for this day for several months, so this was the decisive magic moment. Everything was extremely quiet. It was just a silly Discord conversation like any other day.
Yasmin then looked at the monitor impatiently, and just wanted to get this story over with, so he wouldn't need to talk about X-Tudo anymore.
ah! Ready! I finally got my credit card working! I'm going to buy your X-Tudo now! Now it's time to stop this silly nonsense time!
Yes! Yeees Jasmin!!!
You've messed up the entire online casino! Don't think this will happen again!
Yasmin would then sigh deeply and slowly calm down when she realized that everything was finally solved. She was very thoughtful observing the whole situation before confirming the order
Uff. Okay. I sent your order just the way you asked. The delivery man of food app is already on his way to your house. I recommend you keep an eye on the GPS, or the delivery boy will pass right by.
Wow, my address isn't right? Motoca is going to screw up my X-Tudo!
Ah Vinny! Nope nope! You sent the address! You're going to receive your X-Tudo!
Right now Vinny's phone started beeping Food App Notifications.
Oh yes, man!
Heh! Let me see my phone beeped here.
Vinny anxiously raises his hand and takes the phone, after unlocking it with his finger he looks at the notifications
Vinny saw the notification that the delivery boy was about to arrive, his cell phone already asking him to go to the door of his house to wait for the delivery boy.
so? He is coming?
Yasmin spoke giving a silly little laugh.
I want you to take the phone with you, I left a reminder in App Food about a little surprise for you when the order arrives.
Surprised Vinny speaks in a curious way.
What the hell? What would that be?
Okay, let me enter the call on my cell, HOLD IT!!!!!!!!!!
Yasmin laughs harder before answering.
Siily Vinny. Relax. You'll find out. Please, just don't screw it all up. Mainly the phone!
Meanwhile, Vinny began to hear the noise of the motorcycle.
Okay okay! Let me go see the gate. YES!
Vinny then got up from his computer. He was home alone. He then went to the gate to open it to receive the food. Meanwhile Yasmin kept laughing and answering.
Don't worry, the surprise will be all good like your X-Tudo.
Vinny then met with the delivery boy, already looking a bit confused about what Yasmin was talking about.
Hello, good afternoon sir, are you Vinicius?
Look there! Go mess up the delivery boy again!
Yasmin reply with a silly giggle.
Vinny was wanting to speed up and get back to his room soon before the delivery boy could hear Yasmin laughing
Oops good afternoon, it's me yes, is it the snack?
Oops. Yes, your lunch. An X-Tudo. Everything and a little more.
Delivery Boy tried to react naturally when he noticed a kind of anxiety in Vinny.
This burger was vibrating inside my motocycle, so please, if there's something wrong with your lunch, let me know that we'll exchange your lunch for a new one.
Delivery Boy delivered the X-Tudo box kindly to you.
The burger has arrived! Finally arrived!
Yasmin continued the silly giggles, happy to see Vinny's reaction.
it's a joke, right? prank right? What is this vibration?
Vinny reply with a surprised face and mischievousness.
Delivery Boy looked a little awkwardly, not knowing what to say.

Yes. I saw vibrating. Sorry for the expression, it was a quick word. Ah! Please! Just get it soon! It could be anything, maybe something inside the burguer, you'll need to check it out to see what it is.
Okay can i open it now before you leave?
feel free, just don't delay please. I'm getting late.
Yasmin kept laughing and trying to talk to Vinny.
Then? Where's X-Tudo? We need to see the surprise together to be more fun!
Calm down Jasmin, the guy said there's some stuff vibrating here and I'll show you on cam.
Vinny opens the box slowly. Afraid about what was inside the box. Vinny see an X-Tudo, very big, just the way he wanted, twice the size that was in the photo.
Everything seems normal to me. Ah! It must have been a mistake, maybe it was the bike that was vibrating and I didn't notice. Sorry there bro!
Well. I have to leave now, don't forget to give me 5 stars, thanks.
The Delivery Boy, without thinking twice, was already leaving.
Are you kidding me? What was this thing vibrating?
Yasmin then kept laughing until she heard Vinny talking.
Vibrating? What?! Oh silly Vinny! Don't make up jokes! Haven't you noticed the surprise yet?
Vinny was extremely confused. Trying to understand what was going on. Trying not to think about what he was thinking.
Jasmin, did you tell the delivery boy to do this prank on me? WHY?!
Prank? What?! Don't tell me you haven't figured out what the surprise is yet!
Vinny enters and goes to the kitchen to get a plate and goes back to the bedroom. The X-Tudo mysteriously started to vibrate a little on the table
Ah! Fuck, this fuck is alive.
Vinny approaches X-Tudo and will analyze the burguer carefully.
Live? Vinny! What did you do with X-Tudo? Haven't you noticed the obvious yet?
When Vinny tried to analyze X-Tudo, he felt a kind of blue light, but X-Tudo didn't want to be opened completely at all, it just vibrated more with each touch it received.
Jasmin, there's some stuff coming out of X-Tudo.
Vinny looked at the X-Tudo and tried harder to open it.
Coming out of X-Tudo? What are you talking about! I only ordered a double size!

The X-Tudo vibrated more and more, and the light started to get stronger, but Vinny was starting to realize that he was making progress, and that he just needed to do a little more force, as he accidentally spilled some parts of the X-Tudo on the table because of the vibration.
N..Noo! My house! Wait, I'm looking at what's inside the X-Tudo, everything and a little more, hold it there.
Vinny, you're scaring me. What's happening there?
Vinny still keeps trying to force against the burguer, feeling extremely difficult to keep trying this again and again.
While more Vinny tried, but the light got stronger, and X-Tudo vibrated extremely hard, spilling all parts of X-Tudo all over the kitchen, making a loud noise on the table because of the vibration
NO NO NOOO! MY HOUSE!
V...Vinny? Are you okay? It's for eating X-Tudo! It's not to mess up the X-Tudo! What are you doing?!

Yasmin started talking in a worried voice. Then Vinny finally manages to open X-Tudo, making all the rest of X-Tudo fly all over the place, he soon realizes what he was pulling inside X-Tudo, in fact it was a kind of bracelet, which quickly attaches to the his arm, but in the middle of it all comes a very bright light that takes over the whole kitchen.
W..What?! What is this Vinny? Did the restaurant give you any SmartWatch as a gift?!
Stop kidding! I need help! What is happening?! W...What fuck?! My house will explode!
The glow then started to behave like a black hole, trying to pull Vinny into it.
No, no! NO! This is IMPOSSIBLE! Damn Jasmin it happened, I don't know, your X-Tudo blew up and it's sucking me, this shit stuck on my arm, I'm going to turn the Men 10!!!!
Oh my god! I'll call the police!

Vinny was in the last seconds of his presence before the black hole sucked him in completely, and suddenly he disappeared along with his phone, which was increasingly losing signal as he went deeper into the mysterious black hole.
Vinny?! C.......of.........you....O... ...What's happening?! V...Vinny! The sign! Signal is horrible! N...Nooo! Came back here! V....Viiiiini!
and the signal was completely lost and the Discord connection dropped while Vinny continued to be sucked deeper into the black hole
Jasmin what did you do?! NOOO!
Then suddenly everything went blank, and Vinny's consciousness was temporarily lost for an unknown period of time.

After a long time, Vinny was in another mysterious place, his phone was with him, it was a beautiful day, the morning was starting, another normal day on the place, everything was very calm, the beach was deserted as usual because of the schedule. And mysteriously Vinny wakes up on the beach, lost not knowing why he was there.
Damn man, what happened? I was talking to Jasmin and suddenly... X-TUUUUUUUDO!!! What the fuck happened.

Vinny look at he arm curiously. Soon Vinny noticed that everything was very different with his body when he felt the shape of his body. Instead of him seeing hands, he saw pony paws, while the calm water of the beach continued to calmly move on the sand.
What the...fuck... What? Am I a horse? ...a pony? I don't know.
Vinny try to calm down and I see around me what is happening and I see the phone and I try to move.
I can't touch the phone because I don't have a FINGER!!! but I see there's something on my back, it's wings!!!!!!! WHAT'S HAPPENING HERE?!

So Vinny try to use the wings to poke the phone screen. The phone turned on the screen and when the face detector felt the presence of Vinny eyes, and all Vinny saw was just the screen locked, and the phone was completely out of signal. No 4G, no Wi-Fi, no internet connection.
Oooh okay.

Vinny was sad and hopeless. He didn't know what else could be done in that moment now. Suddenly Vinny starts to hear the sound of footsteps approaching from the opposite direction to him, coming slowly, making him look back curiously.
Vinny see a silhouette of another pony slowly approaching, thinking to do contact with you, and it gets closer and closer.
W...what? O..Oh no. Oh, okay then I'll wait.
Vinny was scared, but he just accepted the fate of waiting for the mysterious earth pony to approach him.
Oh. it's not possible. It's that what I'm really seeing? Did another new pony appear? Are you new around here?
The mysterious pony looked a little scared, trying to understand who you are.
Aah hi, my name is Vinny, are you guys okay? they look worried.
Vinny tried to stay calm, talking calmly and trying to be calm.
Good? this should be my question. Are you sure you're alright? You look kind of scared. How long have you been here?
Oh, I kind of don't remember but I ended up waking up just now, not sure what happened to me last night.
Last night? Have you been attacked by Elite Color?! Keep calm, I can help you!
Mysterious pony comes closer to you, offering to help you
E..Elite color? I really don't remember, and I accept the help, thank you very much.
Vinny tried to remain calm, but slowly felt better as he realized the gentleness of the mysterious pony. But he was still confused and scared about what was happening. He tried to get up but failed.
I think I'll need more than help, I kind of can't walk.
Vinny was very embarrassed to realize that he didn't know how to walk on four legs while answering.
Wait. Can't you walk? Are you sure you're from here? What city do you come from? Just try to stay balanced and don't let your body weight make you lose balance.
Mysterious pony was surprised by your words, he gradually helped you to get in a balanced pose so you could stay seated.
Heck bro, I'm trying to remember and I think I remembered I was eating something and blacked out, and I came here out of nowhere.
Vinny tried to balance himself between his paws as he responded.
From. From nothing?! So I'm right! You are also a new visitor from another dimension!
Vinny lost the balance of the pose of the paws and fell on the sand again.
Oh yes, I think this is more than evidence. Hihi. Don't worry , I teach you to walk. My name is Kenny!

during the giggles of Kenny, Kenny starts to smile at Vinny and prepare to help Vinny stand up again. Vinny felt even better about Kenny's kindness. He looked at Kenny still confused about what was happening, but he simply continued to accept the help.
Yeah hihi, thanks for the help Kenny.
Kenny felt happier wanting to keep helping Vinny.

You're welcome. Just keep calm, and start walking very slowly, you need to keep balance and sync between all 4 legs. This way you'll soon learn to walk.The village is very close to here, you can rest in my house with my friend Raquel.
When we see your SmartMoby, we'll be able to help you better.
Kenny smiles again and started to help Vinny during the first steps to start to walk.
What? What is a SmartMoby? I have one?
Oh? Oh sorry! Yeah! The SmartMoby is on your arm right now. This is part of you, we all have one. It's like a phone, but actually it's a device that carries your soul and keeps you alive here.
Vinny looked at his arm and was surprised. That device had now merged with his arm. It was just a screen on his arm and it was impossible to remove as it was now part of his arm.

Kenny kept helping Vinny walk. The place was very calm. It looked completely deserted. Vinny immediately thought it was something he had already seen somewhere. But he found it extremely strange that the ponies found were different from what he knew about ponies. Was it really the world he was thinking about or could it be just a coincidence?
Hey man, let me get my phone, as I remember, it's a device similar to that in my world, but it has other important features, like listening to music or having many books in it.
Vinny looks for the phone to store the phone in somewhere.
Listen to music? I've never seen anything like this.
Kenny felt surprised and a little scared.
But alright, let me get it! Try to stay upright!
Kenny smiled and let Vinny go so Vinny could try to balance yourself between the 4 legs while he went to get your phone in the sand.
Okay. Fine.
This is much stranger than I imagined. Will I be stuck here forever? How are my friends and my parents doing?
Right after Kenny give the phone, Vinny hold the phone.
I remember the battery and I DIDN'T TAKE THE SHIT CHARGER! WHY?!
Vinny got mentally pissed off. and as soon as I see that there was no signal, Vinny try to turn the phone off.
Oh? Vinny? Are you okay? Is something wrong with your phone?
Kenny said with a curious face, looked at Vinny and he reactions while trying to help he keep up again. Then the two started walking towards the village.

O..oh? Oh yeah, kind of the energy that makes it stay on runs out quickly so I'll only use it in cases of need because I need another part to recharge it. but yes he is normal, thanks for helping me get phone back.
Vinny was worried about his phone battery. It looked like his phone was the last thing left of items from Earth. Vinny's clothes had mysteriously disappeared too.
Recharge a phone? Hmm. Maybe James can help you if he's willing to walk with you. He is a friend of mine who loves adventures. I believe he will be returning home soon.
Kenny spoke thoughtfully as he continued to help you walk.
Okay. Let's go. Soon we'll be home!
James? But I just met you! You're crazy?!

Kenny smiled and ran forward, revealing that Vinny were starting to walk alone without help, but then you started to lose he balance for a few seconds when he realized that there was no one helping he.
Oh? no no no no no!
Vinny tried not to completely lose his paws balance.
At least he seems to be very silly. I see no reason why he wants to kidnap me.
Uff. About earlier, you said something about Elite Color, what would it be exactly?

Elite Color? oh! The Elite Color! Sorry, I forgot to talk about the Elite Color. Elite Color is a mysterious organization that claims to protect this world. We don't really know what they are, but sometimes they do some cruel things. They live on top of the highest mountain in Pony Driland, which is our island you're on.
Kenny then looked at Vinny walking. He was surprised and very happy.
Oh? Look! By the way! You are starting to learn to walk on 4 legs! You're learning fast!
Vinny giggles a little before answering. trying to be a little friendlier
You also said at the beginning, or comment in a strange way, the way you entered me and said "you also came from another dimension" are there others besides me?
Kenny spoke with a worried face.
Oh yes. The others.
Oh shit. Here comes the bad news.

All of us here come from many different dimensions. We've been stuck here forever, we don't know how to get out of here, it's been many years since I've seen my family, and I don't remember in detail what my real body was like.
Kenny tried to be positive as he continued to explain.

I hope you don't get scared by this fact, that's the motive I was worried when I found you here. It's very dangerous for newbies to walk alone around Pony Driland. This place is very dangerous if you don't know how things work around here.
HOLY SHIT! NO! FOREVER?! Is everyone here alien?! That's what i understood?! WHY?!
Ah.
Ah? Please don't be too surprised, Raquel and I are going to help you! If you've been in good company, I'm sure you'll do fine around here.
Kenny was thoughtful, trying to calm Vinny down, so he responded.

It's what we can do for Pony Driland newcomers. I'm sure you'll like your new life. Unfortunately I can't hold back your curiosities. So if you really want to find out more about this place. You'll have to try to be friends with James.
James? Who is James? Why everyone is a alien in a pony body?! Look where I accidentally got myself into an X-Tudo! Someone save me from this nightmare. Please!
Kenny kept walking and he saw the village soon the front.
Oh! Look! We are almost there! Right in time!
Kenny smiled and started to move faster. Vinny was surprised. He just looked around for a few seconds, looking for something randomly. So Vinny tries to follow Kenny's speed.
H..Hey! Wait me!
Kenny arrived in the village, the village was a little busy, Vinny saw some random ponies starting another new day as Kenny arrived at his door.
Kenny starts to smile and looks around looking for you.
Oh? Vinny? Vinny?! Oh Vinny! You are there!
Kenny smiled again and waved at Vinny, happily inviting Vinny to come faster.
Vinny looked smiling back with a pokeface.
I'll get there. A moment.
You're doing great! Soon you will walk better on 4 legs!
Kenny giggles a little before smiling again and kept waving at you, waiting for Vinny to arrive.
Vinny looked smiling back again with a second pokerface.
I'm coming. coming slowly.
Vinny looked smiling back again with a second pokerface. Vinny then tried a little harder, with great difficulty, but he finally arrived.
Hah! I arrived! Yes!
Vinny then was very thoughtful, he looked all around and was surprised by the scenery that was being observed.
Wow There's a lot of ponies here and a lot of little houses here.

Vinny slowly felt that his walking skills were getting better and better. But he could still feel uncomfortable with the whole new environment. He looked very confused and at a loss as to how all this was possible. Why was he there, how did he get there. Everything was just amazing for Vinny.
Yes. You are in Greendream Village. Be very welcome new one!
Kenny knock on the door happily.
Vinny found Kenny's attitude strange, he watched and analyzed him for a few seconds curiously before asking the question.
Oh? Does this house belong to you?
Ehe! It's the house where Raquel and I live. You can feel right at home now. Uou can stay here if you need some shelter.
Kenny is a little nervous for a few seconds to answer, but then he continues with a smile while he look at the door being opened, so Vinny saw Raquel.
Good morning Kenny! How's the... Oh? New one?
Raquel spoke in a frightened way for a few seconds.
Calm down. it's Vinny. I found him on the beach where newbies spawn when they teleport here sunddely. He is here to be received! Right Vinny?
Kenny spoke happily while looking at Vinny.
Ah. Yes?
Yes? Yes. Hello Vinny. Welcome.
Raquel looked curiously at Vinny for a few seconds before answering.
My name is Raquel, nice to meet you. It's the first time I've seen a newbie visit our house.

Raquel spoke in a shy way before smiling back. Vinny then tried not to scare Raquel too much and tried to respond kindly when he realized that this would be the best alternative to not being alone in the unknown world.
Pleasure, my name, well, you already know. My name is Vinny hihihihi. Kenny found me at the beach and brought me here, thank you very much for your consideration.

Vinny smile a little more while looking around. Vinny saw houses and more ponies around having their daily routine, around Vinny also saw some trees around the village, and under these trees there were sticks and some pieces of leaf, stones, it was a very rich place in nature mixed with the village , and later on, there were other places like the street vendors' square and some buildings owned by those who manage the village.
Well, make yourself at home. I...I made some pancakes for breakfast today.
Raquel continued with the shy happy face as she offered to enter. Vinny then went back to listening to the conversation, surprised to hear about the meal.
Pancakes! Today is your lucky day Vinny! Pancakes are the best morning meal we have here at home!

Kenny said all excited in response. Raquel was a little surprised but then she laughed a little. Vinny was still confused, trying to understand all that kindness. Then he would analyze the situation again and just respond. Vinny was a little nervous trying to believe Kenny.

Ahn thank you very much, but why are you helping me? You don't know me or anything like that, for example, I'm a stranger to you, don't you think it's strange for a stranger to enter your house? Even weirder that he came from another world and doesn't even know how to walk right? Doesn't it seem a little strange to you?
Kenny got a little nervous and would just respond by laughing a little to relax.

Oh? Vinny don't worry, I saw in your face that you were lost. We work hard to make guests feel welcome in the village and feel comfortable here. We don't want anyone to risk the life and end up going to the dark side of Pony Driland.
So please make yourself at home. We just want to do this for your own good.
Kenny answered Vinny and offered Vinny to enter too. He proved to be positive in what he was doing. He wanted Vinny to feel good. He just waited for Vinny to enter the house.
Okay okay. I understand, so excuse me, what a beautiful house! *-*
Make yourself at home!
Kenny smiled and rubbed he head at Raquel face. Raquel looks at Kenny for a few seconds before smile, so Raquel rubbed her face back while the two enter the house.
Hahaha. I think I get it. they are a couple. it is cute.

Vinny soon saw that it was a house mixed with a medieval style with the technological things of a modern house. Vinny saw a beautiful room rich in furniture, Vinny just missed some things that are normally used for communication like television and telephone. And just ahead Vinny could see the table where Raquel was preparing breakfast with pancakes. So Vinny waits for kenny to say something, waiting at the entrance, making Kenny look at Vinny.
Oh? Vinny? You may come in! Remember you are welcome here!
Kenny invited Vinny to enter again as Kenny went with Raquel towards the breakfast table.
Oh? Okay. Thank you again for everything.
Vinny was a little more surprised to be invited in. Vinny heading towards an empty chair at the table.
Did you talk about me meeting someone to know the right place? who was it?
Oh? James? Yep! James. He's a great adventurer who understands a lot about everything.
James? Are you sure Kenny? He's kind of grumpy with new people. He always says he wants to do things all by himself. And Vinny just arrived in our world. This is extremely dangerous for him.
Raquel does a sad face, saying a little worried when she starts to think about the negative possibilities that could happen.

But... but Raquel. I'm sure James really needs an adventure partner. I get really worried if something happens to him along the way and there's no one to help him. He is very lucky that he is still alive.
Kenny replied sadly back. Vinny was worried trying to understand what was going on while watching the conversation.
Oh really? Where did I end up accidentally getting myself into?
If Vinny is a good adventurer, I'm sure they can do well!
Cool.
Vinny eats pancakes while doing a poker face in answering this.
Okay! The pancakes are great!
C..Cool?
Raquel get confused when she hears Vinny reaction.
Yep. That's nice! It will be really fun! Vinny will enjoy a good adventure!
Kenny does a silly laugh.
Yes. I said cool in the sense of finding it a bit cool when kenny said "He's very lucky he's still alive" I thought it was a little cool and weird, but nothing that scared me.
Vinny continue eating pancake while doing a nervous giggles.
Kenny, are you sure?
Weeeeeeeeeell...
Kenny laughed nervously as he thought about the consequences.
if Vinny likes a good adventure.
Kenny continue speaking awkwardly while continuing to eat breakfast.
Kenny, please no. Don't be like that, James will be fine, maybe we'd better help him to have a life in the village.

Raquel talks about a way to make Kenny calm down. Raquel was worried about Kenny's reaction to trying to help James. Meanwhile, Vinny was watching the conversation and was slightly worried about Kenny. But he is slowly trusting more as he sees Raquel talking to Kenny, and notes that they are just normal villagers.
Well, I'm new here, so I don't see why not meet new things and new ponies too, of course if it's not too much trouble.
Vinny tried to remain calm and only responded with a slight nervousness. Kenny would then start trying to be more positive, trying to get some hope.
But but, you have a cell phone that does amazing things like you said.
M..Mobile?
Raquel reply, getting a little confused and surprised while holding a piece of the breakfast she is eating. Vinny was curious and a little surprised before answering.

Oh really? Don't you have anything that looks like a cell phone? Cell phones are very common where I came from, they are very common everyone has them, we use them to communicate with other people, watch BoboFlix, play games, send nudity to people, basically it was a very well done work.
value_alternative: Oh really? Don't you have anything that looks like a cell phone? Cell phones are very common where I came from, they are very common everyone has them, we use them to communicate with other people, watch BoboFlix, play games, basically it was a very well done work.

value: C..communicate? Amazing! Communication is rare in Pony Driland! BoboFlix? My God! That name is some specialist agency?!
Kenny's eyes dilated a little as he got excited about the cell phone.
Wait. Nudes? WHAT?!
Raquel was very confused when trying to understand what is happening.
Yes, nudes. A way for you to pay the people you work for.
value_alternative: Yes. This is the phone. Something wrong about it?

value: Vinny was a little embarrassed and thoughtful when thinking how to say about nudes without being explicit.
value_alternative: Vinny tried to understand Raquel's reaction during some seconds.

value: Well, yes Kenny, you can do everything inside the phone, it's amazing, but unfortunately it's limited in terms of functioning where it only stays on until the battery or batteries run out.
Raquel is still embarrassed, trying to understand what Vinny was talking about.
value_alternative: Raquel didn't know what to say and just continued watching the conversation.

value: Wait, run out of battery? And how do you recharge that battery? Did you bring anything to do this?
Kenny remains excited, wanting to understand more about the mysterious cell phone.
Wait, I didn't bring the charger! SHIT!
Okay okay. Unfortunately I don't have the charger, because I wasn't with me on the beach and I don't have faith that it's here.

Vinny was very uncomfortable and very nervous trying to think about what to do if the cell phone just ran out of battery. He was very worried. So Vinny looked at Raquel and saw her reaction again, so he decided to ask.
Ah? Are you ok Raquel?
Vinny speak calmly and surprised.
No...nothing...nothing. I hope I got it wrong. The breakfast was great, I'll take care of my gardening now. I will be right back.
Raquel makes a disguised smile of shocked reaction, and moves towards the door that leads to the garden of the house.
Raquel? Where are you going? Wait! Oh okay, too late.
Kelly was looking a little confused as Raquel closes the door.
Well Vinny, sorry I didn't see anything on the sand when I found you. But maybe James can help you with that. I don't know anything about technology, only James knows better about it.
Kenny makes a slight smile, trying to show a feeling of apology for what happened.
Yeah, I'm going to save the remaining energy for something very useful. Don't worry, I forgive you.
Vinny sighs deeply.
Well, Kenny, can I help you with something? What do you do on the morning? Can I help you with something?
Thank you. I'm going to the market to shop soon. If you want to accompany me, it would be a great help.
Kenny giggles a little, trying to forget a little about the negative side of the previous conversation.
Ah, wow, yes yes, we can walk and you will instruct me more about walking on 4 and even trying to use the wings if possible of course.
No problem! It's going to be fun and fun and a lot of fun! Every step is progress!
Kenny speaks confidently.

Okay. Maybe this is all a dream, maybe I hit my head while trying to eat my X-Tudo. Let's take it easy, the exit from this place shouldn't be too far. There must be someone superior who can send me home.
And about the wings, well, Raquel and I are earth ponies, we don't know how to fly, you'll have to find another pegasus to learn how to use them.
Kenny replied with a nervous smile trying to find an answer for you.
Ah, okay okay.
ARGH! Fall for the obvious. Nice.
What time are we going to the market?
Now! I've already finished my breakfast schedule.
Kenny replied while finishing the rest of the food on his plate before leaving a small friendly giggles about Vinny answer.
Ok ok ok, if possible I can accompany you and we can talk on the way ok?
Fine!
Kenny replied happily as he got up from the chair and put the bag saddle on he body. Then Kenny and Vinny started walking towards the market.
a saddle? Is that like a backpack? Interesting.

Vinny watched Kenny use the saddle for a few seconds as he followed Kenny. Then the two ponies started walking through the village. Vinny and Kenny were walking through the village towards the market, passing several and several ponies and houses, the village was very busy with several ponies living life, adults and children living their routine, and children playing happily on the street. Then Kenny would look at Vinny and ask kindly.
Well. What would you like to talk about?
Where do you and Raquel know each other from? very nice of you 2 to welcome me after I suddenly show up on the beach. In my world people aren't that kind.
Kenny was a little surprised and responded.
That's true? Is your species going extinct? This looks terrible.

No, these are stupid things to be honest. Oh many nations in wars, deadly viruses and deadly diseases spread around the world, but I had a normal life. I woke up every day, I ate, I did my housework since I didn't have a job and I slept in peace, but it was a little life bad for people, people were very selfish and only thought about them, so it was a little bad. but I could live without any problems. But well, sorry to interrupt you, but you can continue.
Nations at war? virus? Were you in the middle of an apocalypse? That's terrible. Well, I forgive you, maybe one day everyone will understand better about this. Well then.
